name: keyword_search_at_coordinate_point
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool local_rank_tracker.
Tool description: Fast and Reliable geolocation rank tracker API - get Google My Business ranking across the local area, broken up into a grid.
API description: Fetch search results for a given query at a specified geographic coordinate point using the RapidAPI Local Rank Tracker service.

x_user_agent.description: Device type for the search. Default `desktop`.
